name: Knockout Mayhem
description:
KnockOut Mayhem is a 2D physics-based arcade game.

Gameplay Player:

The rules of the game are simple: You fall off the stage, you fail.

Toss your ball at approaching enemies to knock them off the platform before they knock you off.

Enable powerups in the shop to increase your survival chances.

Enemies:

Enemies will primarily attack by spitting balls.

They will behave differently based on the difficulty,  such as tracking the player or spitting ice balls

Choose amongst a variety of stages, each with a unique attribute.

Modes:

Endless - Battle against an endless wave of increasingly-difficult enemies.

Challenge - Enter a random stage and complete a task to win extra points.

Controls:

Arrow Keys to move

'Z' to jump.

'X' to throw your ball.

Shop:

Customise your character or buy powerups using points earned through battle.
